if.test: sfkqy != null and sfkqy != '' and sfkqy != '全部'

mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.yabh yabh, t.yasxh yasxh, t.yabbh yabbh, t.yalxdm yalxdm, t.yamc yamc, t.yajb yajb, t.dxid dxid, t.dxmc dxmc, t.bwid bwid, t.bwmc bwmc, t.sfkqy sfkqy, t.jgid jgid, t.jgbm jgbm, t.jgmc jgmc, t.zzrid zzrid, t.zzrmc zzrmc, TO_CHAR(t.zzsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzsj, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_YA_QTDX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c1.CODE_NAME yalxmc, CASE sfkqy WHEN '0' THEN '否' ELSE '是' END AS sfkqymc, z.JGMC jgidmc FROM YAGL_YA_QTDX t LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c1 ON (t.YALXDM = c1.CODE_VALUE AND c1.CODEID = 'AB8867B159A440CC80FEACEAC3F6542B' AND c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') LEFT JOIN YAGL_ZZJG z ON (t.JGID = z.UUID AND z.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c1.CODE_NAME yalxmc, CASE sfkqy WHEN '0' THEN '否' ELSE '是' END AS sfkqymc, z.JGMC jgidmc FROM YAGL_YA_QTDX t LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c1 ON (t.YALXDM = c1.CODE_VALUE AND c1.CODEID = 'AB8867B159A440CC80FEACEAC3F6542B' AND c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') LEFT JOIN YAGL_ZZJG z ON (t.JGID = z.UUID AND z.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.UUID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_QTDX(uuid,yabh,yasxh,yabbh,yalxdm,yamc,yajb,dxid,dxmc,bwid,bwmc,sfkqy,jgid,jgbm,jgmc,zzrid,zzrmc,zzsj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yasxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yabbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yalxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yajb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfkqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_YA_QTDX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_QTDX(uuid,yabh,yasxh,yabbh,yalxdm,yamc,yajb,dxid,dxmc,bwid,bwmc,sfkqy,jgid,jgbm,jgmc,zzrid,zzrmc,zzsj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.yabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yabh,#{item.yasxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yasxh,#{item.yabbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yabbh,#{item.yalxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yalxdm,#{item.yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yamc,#{item.yajb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yajb,#{item.dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxid,#{item.dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxmc,#{item.bwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bwid,#{item.bwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bwmc,#{item.sfkqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sfkqy,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.jgbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgbm,#{item.jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgmc,#{item.zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrid,#{item.zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrmc,#{item.zzsj,jdbcType=DATE} zzsj,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), yabh = VALUES(yabh), yasxh = VALUES(yasxh), yabbh = VALUES(yabbh), yalxdm = VALUES(yalxdm), yamc = VALUES(yamc), yajb = VALUES(yajb), dxid = VALUES(dxid), dxmc = VALUES(dxmc), bwid = VALUES(bwid), bwmc = VALUES(bwmc), sfkqy = VALUES(sfkqy), jgid = VALUES(jgid), jgbm = VALUES(jgbm), jgmc = VALUES(jgmc), zzrid = VALUES(zzrid), zzrmc = VALUES(zzrmc), zzsj = VALUES(zzsj), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select: SELECT , c1.CODE_NAME yalxmc, CASE sfkqy WHEN '0' THEN '否' ELSE '是' END AS sfkqymc, z.JGMC jgidmc FROM YAGL_YA_QTDX t LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c1 ON (t.YALXDM = c1.CODE_VALUE AND c1.CODEID = 'AB8867B159A440CC80FEACEAC3F6542B' AND c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') LEFT JOIN YAGL_ZZJG z ON (t.JGID = z.UUID AND z.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
